fields.brochure_text:
Availability in October 2026 or summer 2027.
Pricing of €8,500.00 for 2026 and €8,900.00 for 2027, which includes:
- The Le Pavillon room located at the rear of the Château, offering a panoramic view of the old building.
- The Château's six ‘Prestige’ rooms and Junior Suites, which can accommodate around twenty guests.
- A secluded location with bucolic surroundings.
The package includes:
  
- The fully equipped 700m² Le Pavillon reception room, with sound system and lighting, until 5pm on Sunday
- Use of the kitchens by our team or your caterer
- Provision of tables and chairs for up to 300 people (cocktail capacity: 450 people - seated meal: 250 people)
- Accommodation at the Château for the night from Saturday to Sunday until 12 noon (with the option of renting the outbuildings for additional beds)
- The party can continue until 4 a.m.
- The room is available on Friday afternoon if you wish to set up your decorations and deliver anything else you need to ensure your wedding runs smoothly. 
- There is a car park with space for around 100 cars.
In addition, catering services can be provided for the reception, meal or brunch.

Visits of the estate and Le Pavillon hall are possible to get a feel for the venue.

Some information about the venue www.chateaulagut.com which is situated in the beautiful Dordogne in the South west of France.

Chateau Lagut is more than just a wedding venue. You will have the whole venue for your exclusive use As if it would be your home, you stay on the venue and you organize your wedding according to YOUR idea. You accommodate yourself and your guests for several days in the château and gîtes during your wedding week-end. What a thrill to prepare the wedding together! And what a joy to extend the party with your guests! 46 people can stay in the gîtes and château. The price for a weekend (Friday-Sunday) in Oktober 2026, In April, May 2027 is €9.500. VAT is included in the price and 46 people can stay in the gîtes and château and the price is including sheets, towels and cleaning for the gîtes and château. It’s possible to stay more days if you want (additional pricing available). For a wedding during the week (Monday-Thursday) the price is €8500 in Oktober, April and May. We don’t have availability anymore in September 2026.

There are also 9 glamping tents with comfortable beds and in the tents can stay 32 people in total
The price for the glamping tents is €27 a person per night (including sheets and towels).In total (gîtes, château and tents) 78 people can stay at the property, but there are several hotels and b&b’s in the neighborhood for your other guests to stay or there is the possibility that they bring their own tent and can stay at the property.

For a small wedding, it can take place in the castle and the different rooms, each with its own atmosphere and own charm. For larger groups, the beautiful banquet hall is perfect. The natural stone walls and the wood-beamed ceiling give this room a lot of charm and can then be decorated entirely to your own taste. With an area of 300 m2 it is suitable for a maximum of 200 guests. The professional kitchen is fully equipped and can be used by the caterer of your choice, so you can enjoy a culinary (wedding) dinner in a unique location. No corkage charge. The natural beauty of the wine cellars can be a perfect place for the reception. The atmosphere is one of unique, laid-back elegance providing for an intimate, down-to-earth experience. Round tables for 120 persons and chairs are available for free.

We have bbq’s and a wonderful bread oven in which you can make delicious pizzas.

The venue can accommodate 200 people (inside and outside) for the ceremony and you are free to choose the place on the venue where you prefer to do it (lots of wonderful spots to organize this). There is also a very nice little chapel at the venue that can be used for the ceremony. We don’t charge anything for the ceremony.

Wedding preparations take lot of time and D-Day always goes too fast. Take the time to share and extend those precious moments with your loved ones. Take pleasure in offering them not only a beautiful ceremony and party, but a truly relaxing stay, where everyone you love will bond deeper together.

Rediscover the taste of simple pleasures: have breakfast all together, prepare for the ceremony in your room with your friends a glass of champagne in hand, lounge by the pool the day after, take a nap under the trees in the park while your grandmothers chat in the living room ...

You organize your wedding at your idea and with no time limit (so you can continue the party until the early hours in the morning), no corkage fees…just as it would be at home, with personal advice and support to assist in organizing the wedding. There is also a wedding planner that can organize everything.

On the venue you can really find every possible facility to have a pleasant stay. There is a big heated swimming pool that is operational all year, a tennis court, a petanque court, a trampoline for young and old, a sauna and jacuzzi to really relax and enjoy the beautiful starry sky, a treehouse, table tennis and lots more.

Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is also available on site.

The natural beauty of the place and the tranquillity that prevails gives a unique and rare atmosphere to share special moments with your loved ones. Enjoy a stunning sunset with panoramic views over the surrounding countryside; Everything is in place to make your wedding that much more special.

The airport from Limoges and Bergerac are about 1 hour driving and the airport from Bordeaux 1h30.

**« Moon River » Package - 375 € per person**
_Valid for a minimum of 50 guests_
 
**Your cocktail**
 
6 cocktail pieces
_Selection of savory canapés_
 
Champagne beverage package – 1h
_Champagne Deutz Cuvée The Peninsula, selection of wine, hard drinks, softs (3 glasses per person)_

**Your wedding dinner**
 
Gourmet Menu – 4-courses
_Amuse-bouche, starter, main-course, dessert_
 
Prestige wine selection
_According to our Sommelier’s choice (1 bottle for 2)_
 
Champagne glass to be served during the dessert
_Champagne Deutz Cuvée The Peninsula_
 
**« Dancing Leaves » Package - 475 € per person**
_Valid for a minimum of 50 guests_
 
**Your cocktail**
 
8 cocktail pieces
_Selection of savory canapés_
 
Champagne beverage package – 1h
_Champagne Deutz Cuvée The Peninsula, selection of wine, hard drinks, softs (4 glasses per person)_

**Your wedding dinner**
 
Gourmet Menu – 5 courses
_Amuse-bouche, starter, 2 main-courses, dessert_
_Or_
Prestige Menu – 4 courses
_Amuse-bouche, starter, main-course, dessert_
 
Excellence wine selection
_According to our Sommelier’s choice (1 bottle for 2)_
 
Champagne glass to be served during the dessert
_Champagne Deutz Cuvée The Peninsula_
** **
These offers include a classic and delicate floral decoration on tables and high-boy tables and the rental fees.
 
Ceremonies and dancing evenings are on request with additional fees.
These offers do not include the wedding cake (on request from 50€ per guest), a tailored floral decoration and any additional and external services.

For weddings at the estate, a dedicated event package that includes the exclusive rental of the entire property for a minimum stay of 3 nights (7 nights in July/August). This package covers on-site accommodation for your guests, as well as access to all event spaces, furniture, and services, as outlined below:
Accommodation up to 35 guests :
Guests will be accommodated on-site in the château and its outbuildings:
\- In the château : 11 bedrooms and 6 bathrooms (maximum 15 people, due to fire safety regulations)
\- In the cottage (outbuilding): 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (up to 12 guests)
\- In the loft (outbuilding) : 1 bedroom and a dormitory with 6 beds (8 guests total)
Each house includes its own kitchen and living room.
(A detailed floor plan of the rooms is attached.)

Event up to 40 guests maximum:
Ceremony :
You are welcome to hold your wedding ceremony anywhere in the park or in the small on-site chapel.
Wedding dinner Options:
In good weather: Outdoors in the park, using our long wooden tables and chairs (up to 40 people)
In case of bad weather :
 \- Indoors at the château: up to 32 people seated in one room (4 round tables in the Yellow Living Room), or 40 people across adjoining rooms
 \- In the newly renovated Garden House: up to 40 people seated
Dancing Party:
The party can take place outdoors in the park or indoors on the stone floor room inside the château.
All furniture, including tables, chairs, and tablecloths, is provided for the ceremony, seated dinner, and cocktail hour.

Catering :
Catering services are offered for your stay and the wedding day for up to 40 guests.
(Sample 2025 new menus attached)
You are also welcome to use the kitchens in each house if you prefer to prepare your own meals during your stay.

Costs :
The event rental package includes:
\* Exclusive use of the entire estate from Day 1 (5:00 PM) to the final day (10:00 AM)
\* On-site accommodation for up to 35 guests in the château and outbuildings
\* Use of reception spaces and setup of all event furniture (tables, chairs, tablecloths) for one event day with up to 40 guests
\* Use of the chapel for the ceremony 
\* Setup of outdoor lighting (string lights and spotlights) for the event

Package Price for 3 Nights: €10,900
Additional nights: €2,000 per night
Additional costs:
\* End-of-stay cleaning: €550
\* House linen: €10 per person
\* Tourist tax: €0.60 per adult per night

Optional Services :
The following can also be provided if needed:
\* Sound and lighting system for the dance party: €250
\* Prestige dinnerware set for the wedding dinner (vintage porcelain plates, silver cutlery, luxury glasses): €10 per person

A list of recommended vendors (florist, photographer, wedding planner, celebrant, musicians, etc.) can be shared, but you're welcome to use your own suppliers.

If you wish to book your dates, the rental agreement along with bank details for the 50% deposit will be sent to confirm your reservation. The remaining balance will be due no later than 30 days before your arrival.

Please don’t hesitate to reach out with any further questions.

At Château de Saint-Girons, the domain is provided and couples have free choice of providers (caterer, DJ, photographer, equipment rental, etc.).

The domain includes:

\- Northside, the entrance and the parking lots;

\- Southside, the reception areas including the South terrace of the house, the swimming pool lawn where takes place generally the cocktail party, our “Préau” which is ideal for the dinner and the party up to 130 people maximum (beyond, the dinner is necessarily outdoor - installation of a tent possible at your expenses), a French garden which can serve for photos, child area with swings and trampoline and, to finish, a space for outdoor ceremonies (option with arrival at 5 pm instead of 6 pm - 250 euros).
 
There are restrooms (2 toilets, 2 urinals and 4 sinks), a covered area for the caterer with available connections (refrigerated truck, steam rooms, etc.), and a room to make children sleep if needed (15 m ², option - 250 euros).

There is also the option to come back the next day for a brunch (option - 1 000 euro – noon to 6 pm, swimming pool available under surveillance at your expense - approximately 200 euros).

The furniture is generally managed by the caterer (otherwise, renters are known very well which also proposes dance floors), the venue furniture is more for decoration.
 
For a wedding reception a Saturday - 6pm to 4 am in the morning on Sundays - for 60 people, the price will be 5 000 euros (September 2026) / 4 500 euros (October 2026) / 5 000 euros (May 2027). Cocktail will be outside, dinner outside and party will be under the Pavilion (outside parties no longer accepted). In case of bad weather, the cocktail could also be done under the pavilion but it is usually advised on finding a last minute small tent to seperate the cocktail from dinner / party.

4 guest rooms are offered on-site (2 rooms and 2 suites - rates between 240 euros and 310 euros/ room/ night with 2 breakfasts included in high season).As part of the wedding receptions, in addition to Saturday, Friday will be half price allowing you to enjoy your rooms from the morning for the preparations (4 rooms on Saturday = 1 070 euros - 4 rooms on Friday & Saturday = 1 605 euros in high season).

Wedding rental periods are on a minimum of 4 Days / 3 Nights for week-ends event, with accommodations for 29 persons on site : 15 guests in main Château and 14 guests in the « Guest-House » situated 20 meters from the château. 
The 16 en-suites bedrooms have A/C & Wifi trough a fiber connection, a daily bedrooms cleaning is done by the housemaids staff.
The property is completely privatized during the rental period , and plenty of B&B and good hotels are available at less than 30 minutes by car for non resident guests.

Access to the 16 acres of the property during the stay : 
Infinity Swimming Pool ( 25m X 10m ) / Inside Squash / Fitness area / Tennis court / Basketball court / Volley ball court / Vegetable Garden / Playground for Kids / Parking ( Helipad )

It’s possible to do during the rental period a welcome/rehearsal dinner on site also a brunch by the pool without additional extra fees. 

For the wedding day, the property have plenty of possibilities for the different steps of the night.

Generally guests arrive from the main gate, at the north façade a welcome cocktail could be performed, then guests can go trough inside the château to access at the « French garden Area ». The ceremony can take place inside the 1614 consecrated chapelle ( up to 70 guests ) or near the fountain in the south park or at the south façade; after the ceremony the main cocktail could take place around the infinity swimming pool, and the dinner and party part near the château at the French garden area ( south façade ). 

All the event must take place outside the building and in case of bad weather, a marquee must be prepared in « plan B ».
The music must be stopped at 03 AM, sound limitation 90 Décibels (technician on site for control). ( midweek event : end of music 2AM ) 
Live Bands allow the wedding night but sonorisation and technical supervision mandatory by : « Aucop » company. ( Electronic Battery ) 

Authorisation to perform Fireworks and events received up to 150 pax. ( firework upon approval depending calendar ).

Affiliated caterers only : Helen Traiteur / Frederic Bernard / L’éveil des Papilles / Brunch me Up.

Additionally Include in the rental :

_Wedding night venue supervision ( Technical  ) _
_Only DJ - the Wedding Dancing sound system include ( Speakers - Sound engineer )_
_Toilet waiter service ( Rehearsal / Wedding / Brunch )_
_Brunch lifeguard supervision _
_-_
_2X Continental Buffet Breakfast ( 29x Resident Guests )_
_Wedding lunch take-away buffet ( 29x Resident Guests )_

\-

**\*Rental prices & availabilities for 2027  : **

April : 55,000 € ( friday/monday )
May : **30/03 - **65,000 €** //  07/10 - **75,000 € **// 14/17 -** 85,000 €  // **21/24 -** 95,000 €** // 28/31** - 115.000 € 
June : ** **135,000 € ( friday/monday )
July & August : 160,000 € ( Thursday/monday ) // Midweek : 120,000 € _(Monday to Friday)   ( **Only 1 event per month** ) _
September : **03/06 & 10/13** - 120.000 € // **17/20 & 24/27** - 95.000 € ( friday/monday )
October : 70,000 € ( friday/monday )
\-
\-
_Additional rental day possible depending periods._
\-
Rest of the year on request.
\-
_Midweek rental possibility on request _

Prices are for the venue privatization only and don't include : event catering / florist / furniture rental / technical / etc… 

A wedding planner must be in charge of total co-organisation, contacts can be shared if needed. 
\*Prices quoted are available for a period of 1 Month

Visit of the property or video-call tour is possible on appointment only.

All our weddings at No3 are bespoke and so individually planned, designed and co ordinated to each couple, therefore we do not offer ’set prices’ for everything except the venue. 
It really does depend what you want for your wedding but here is a base line idea of costs. It is all planned and designed with the wedding planner so no need to worry about the organisation in any way. 

> Have you seen our brochure on our website? It gives all the details of how our weddings work at No3. 

   €20,000 Venue inclusive of accommodation in the entire chateau for 12 people for 3 nights. 
    Including tables and chairs which would be around €2,000
    Full fairy light canopy over the outdoor dining included (install price for this would be around €4,000)
    NO CORKAGE CHARGES, which means you can buy your wine, champagne and beer through a local supplier at very reasonable cost. 
    This venue price including all of the above is inclusive of VAT. It is the price for up to 100 guests. €150PP extra for over 100 guests.   
> 
> 
> Then you would have the following to consider based on 70 guests and a relative cost for 100 guests. These prices are a guide only from the suppliers, based on weddings this year.
> 
> **Wedding day**
> 
> **Catering**
> 
> **€165pp**, this includes a pre ceremony drink, drinks reception drinks, canapes, 3 course dinner, wine with dinner, evening party bar, evening snack, staff, basic tableware. Total for 70 guests= **€11,550**
> 
> **\* this is a very standard fee, it could be reduced if you removed formality and the need for 3 courses.**
> 
> **Rentals**
> 
> This is not needed at No3 as this is included in the rental price but as set up is not included, it would be best to assume around €300-400 for a set up and takedown fee. Total **€300-400**
> 
> **Photography**
> 
> This can range from €2000-10,000 with a fair average being around **€4000**
> 
> **Videography**
> 
> Same as above and a little more expensive but on average **€4000**
> 
> **Celebrant **
> 
> **€1000 but quite often couples like to ask a close family member or friend. **
> 
> **Florals and props**
> 
> Average floral spend is **€4000** which would give a decent amount for 70 guests. You might want more or less florals and props.
> 
> **DJ**
> 
> A DJ for the full day will be around **€2000**
> 
> **Band**
> 
> A very average wedding band will cost around **€4000 **some including equipment and others not, if it is not including equipment add another €1000 to this cost.
> 
> 
> **Hair and makeup**
> 
> 1 bride plus 4 bridesmaids, hair and makeup would cost around **€1000-€1500**
> 
> **Transport **
> 
> **€700** per 55 seater bus per return journey per day. This would bring all guests to and from the nearby town of Cognac (15 minutes) where the majority would be staying. 
> 
> **Pre wedding event**
> 
> This can cost very little, Luciole's allow them to hire it out on a minimum spend of €2000 but the guests pay for this, if they do not reach if the clients pay the difference. A rooftop will cost around €5000 with some drinks and food. Bar Lys is around €3000 inclusive of some drinks and snack boards
> 
> **Post wedding event**
> 
> A post wedding BBQ with drinks will cost somewhere around **€60pp**
> 
> **Planner**
> 
> **€6,000 minimum/approx.**
> 
> **Insurance-mandatory**
> 
> **€500 aprox**
> 
> A grand total for No3 inclusive of:
> 
> Venue- €20,000
> Planner- €6000
> Catering x 70 guests- €11,500
> Alcohol all day-included above
> Rental items(crockery & tableware etc)-included but €400 to add for set up
> Florals- €2500(minimum)
> Entertainment (DJ)- €2000
> Photographer- €4000
> Transport- €700
> Insurance- €500
> Hair & makeup- €1500
> Celebrant- €1000
> 
> **70 guests = £42,000 (€50,000)** (this is not including a pre or post wedding event & it is a DJ not a band, plus the floral spend is €2500) and no videographer. This also does not include rings, suits, dresses, stationary.
> 
> **100** guests based on the above=**£49,000 (€58,000) **-higher minimum floral spend & more transport required
